item.title: League of Legends: Wild Rift (@wildrift) on X 🎬
item.description:
New patch, new skins! Check out our newest champ and don’t forget our newest season rewards for Ranked and Wild Pass!
🥽 Heimerdinger 🐉 Dragon Trainer Heimerdinger 💤 Dream Raider Kha'Zix 👑 Glorious Crown Jhin
